amendment.description: Amendment narrows the scope of "sneak-and-peak" delayed notification search warrants; and requires a report to Congress on the number of search warrants granted and the number of delayed notices authorized.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in part B of House Report 109-178 to require reporting by the Administrative Office of the Courts on search warrants and also eliminates the provision "unduly delaying trial" in the delayed notification section of the Patriot Act for "sneak and peak" searches.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 21 (Roll no. 408).
